nodes.title: Article 2
nodes.summary: The partial document describes the composition of a commission, specifying its members. The commission is led by ministers holding key portfolios (Finance, Plan, Foreign Affairs, Budget, Economy, Industry/SMEs, Mines, Public Works), includes representatives from the Head of State and the Prime Minister, incorporates the Governor of the Central Bank and heads of public debt and investment promotion agencies, and includes delegates from major business federations and associations representing large enterprises, SMEs, and national portfolio companies.
